messenger.title: Messaging
messenger.information: Your messages will be displayed here.

requests.title: Requests/Notifications
requests.information: Request and notifications are displayed here. Users that make requests (if admin) will be displayed here ready for your approval. Things to do with events that you are named on will be displayed here

view_shift.title: View shift
view_shift.information: All the information about the shift is displayed here

create_event.title: Creating event/shift
create_event.information: Events / Requests or shifts can be created here. They differ based on the user that is creating them.

upload_employee.title: Batch Upload Employees
upload_employee.information: CSV files like shifts can be uploaded by they must follow strict guidelines

upload_timesheet.title: Uploading new timesheet
upload_timesheet.information: Timesheets require a certain template for them to be uploaded and used frequently, they will need to consits of the following, type,  startDate,endDate,assignedTo

create_template.title: Creating a new template
create_template.information: When uploading a new timesheet, users are given the option to save that timesheet and it't content as a template. This template when used in the future will update itself by one week when used. This is still an experimental feature and therefore, should be used cautiously.

team_viewing.title: Viewing Team
team_viewing.information: Your team members whether online or offline will appear here. There are quick actions that are displayed that will let you message members or book requests for them (admin)
